name: Superhero Shave Salon Adventure - Free Comic Games For Kids
name_original: Superhero Shave Salon Adventure - Free Comic Games For Kids
description:
Did you know even Superheroes need to keep themselves looking presentable? Well that includes shaving which is exactly the objective of this game!
Choose from 6 amazing superheroes;

The Dark Warrior
The Pirate King
The Man Of Power
The Power Man
The Mighty Hero
The Night Hero

All of them have different superhero powers and strengths, but they all have one thing in common, they need a shave!

Use realistic shaving tools, use foam before you shave to save cuts and shaving rashes from occurring, however, if they do, it's no problem, because part of the shaving experience in this game is you get to use after shave and rash cream to soothe those potential hiccups!

So, download it today, and keep our superheroes looking good!
